On Starting New

10 Mar 2011

Many people have asked me, well…not really asked inasmuch as wondered why I would simply jump publishing platforms and start 100% new. Well to you good sir and doubtfully, mam, this guy has really no idea. It probably has something to do with a high probability that there is some “aydeeachdee” in them there genes, or maybe there was some unknown (but now known) monetary ponzie scheme that I have going on with my one reader. Maybe… one reader? Anyway, the point of all this is to formally say that there won’t be any importing of my old material. We started new, and dammit, we are going to finish new! With that, here is your tech moment of…catz5.
